dublin_core.dcvalue: Handheld mobile phones MPHs have become a cultural accessory device no less so than a wrist watch Nevertheless the use of MPHs has given rise to great concern because of possible adverse health effects from exposure to the radiofrequency radiation RFR emitted by the device Previous studies suggested correlation between MPH and salivary gland tumors
The influence of handheld mobile phones on human parotid gland secretion.
